property.note: Where the text in the original language is NOT part of the current product

name.language: Original language of a translated text

property.note: Where different from language of text: used mainly for serials
Where the text in the original language is part of a bilingual or multilingual product

name.language: Original language in a multilingual edition

property.note: Where the text in a translated language is part of a bilingual or multilingual product

name.language: Translated language in a multilingual edition

property.note: For example, on an audiobook or video product. Use for the only available audio track, or where there are multiple tracks (eg on a DVD), for an alternate language audio track that is NOT the original. (In the latter case, use code 11 for the original language audio if it is included in the product, or code 10 to identify an original language that is not present in the product)
Where the audio in the original language is NOT part of the current product
Where the audio in the original language is part of a multilingual product with multiple audio tracks

name.language: Original language audio track in a multilingual product

property.note: Use for the language of footnotes, endnotes, annotations or commentary, instructions or guidance for use etc, where it is different from the language of the main text
Use for the language of any introductory text, prologue, etc, or epilogue, end matter, etc, where it is different from the language of the main text. Only for use in ONIX 3.0 or later

Eg for the book ‘Ingles para latinos’, English. For phrasebooks and language teaching, learning or study material. Wherever possible, the language should also be listed as the subject of the book. Only for use in ONIX 3.0 or later

Use of significant words, phrases, quotations or short passages from a language other than the main language of the text, as an integral part of the text. This does not include ‘loanwords’, academic Latin, etc. Only for use in ONIX 3.0 or later

name.language: Additional vocabulary / text in this language
